Text.valUnicode: Replace FL numbers by external numbers
Omit ledger numbers if defined for ledger

Text.val: -- Cancel
Use PK to get latest LCCH
-- Calculate SUM of LGCD_MUTATIONS
-- Calculate SUM of LGCD_BALANCE
rows with all 0's don't get printed.. no point in writing more than one of them

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast (sum (LGCD_AMOUNTDEBITH - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDITH) as decimal (18,2)) FROM :1 WHERE LGCD_ADMNO= :2 and LGCD_LDGR_NO = :3 and LGCD_DATE :4 and LGCD_LGCH_ID > 0 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

SELECT cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTC) as decimal (18,2)), cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (18,2)) FROM :1/LGCC WHERE LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO= :2 and LGCC_LDGR_NO = :3 and LGCC_DATE :4 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :5 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :6 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

-- Summary-Fields
-- Summarize Amount-Fields
-- Info: 'Please close previous Excel file'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (LGCD_AMOUNTDEBITH) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (LGCD_AMOUNTCREDITH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCD, :1/LDGR where LGCD_LGCH_ID > 0 and LDGR_ADMNO = LGCD_ADMNO and LDGR_NO = LGCD_LDGR_NO and :2 for fetch only
